projects.title: Kolab Project
projects.description: Kolab Project is as much a creative studio as it is a cannabis company. Offering a refined collection of high quality cannabis products and design-focused, purposeful goods. The objective of this website was to have a hub for all of their product information, product availability across Canada, and their product narrative and art through - what they call - Diamond City.

projects.title: National Sparks
projects.description: The National Sparks Department is an extension of Back Forty cannabis company. The objective of this website was to provide adult users with whimsical age gated fodder including playlists, excuse generators, newsletter articles, tattoo ideas, etc. to pair with their cannabis experiences.

projects.title: Robinsons
projects.description: Robinsons is driven by an unwavering commitment to craftsmanship, and focus to grow the best cannabis. The objective of this website was to communicate and emulate the simple vast beauty of the Canadian east coast where Robinsons is grown, featuring large grainy film images and simple refined text layouts of product information.

projects.title: Dosecann
projects.description: Dosecann Cannabis Solutions is a Canadian cannabis company that specializes in the development and manufacturing of innovative cannabis products. They offer a wide range of cannabis-infused products including oils, capsules, and sprays. Dosecann is a calm wellness focused brand - it was important the website reflect these feelings, along with providing information in French for their Quebec customers.

projects.title: Blue Tile Lounge
projects.description: Blue Tile Lounge Skateboard Shop is a skater owned and operated shop since the original BTL Park in 1997. The objective of this site was to create simple online store for customers to order product all across Canada, and limit the order of special products outside of Canada, while highlighting their team of riders and shop videos.

projects.title: Auxly
projects.description: Auxly Cannabis Group Inc. is a top 5 Canadian licensed producer of cannabis made up cannabis enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and researchers with a belief in quality innovation and building authentic connections with consumers. The objective of their website was to give an overview of their inhouse brands, while providing their investor relations team a platform to easily update the latest PR documents and accouncements.
